overview: Icon Male is pleased to bring you four blazing hot vignettes where hot firemen save the day. Young jock Brandon Wilde is rescued from his fraternity house by Fireman Rodney Steele, who has some wise words for the young boy after it's revealed Brandon started the fire...Retired fireman Nick Capra finds cutie Kyler Grey suffering from heat stroke during a hike and whisks him to safety...lonely, horny firemen Andy Banks and Billy Santoro comfort each other in the firehouse barracks...and finally, Armond Rizzo tenders his resignation to fire chief Adam Russo, who is stunned to find out why the younger man seeks to leave.
tagline: THE ONLY FIRE HE CAN'T PUT OUT IS THE ONE IN HIS PANTS
title: Firemen
